verses.roman:
saba bhakta lañā prabhu gelā puṣpodyāne
viśrāma kariyā kailā mādhyāhnika snāne

synonyms: saba bhakta lañā—with all the devotees; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gelā—went; puṣpa-udyāne—in the flower garden; viśrāma kariyā—resting; kailā—performed; mādhyāhnika snāne—bath in the afternoon.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then entered the flower garden with all His devotees. After resting there for some time, He finished His afternoon bath.
